name: CVE-2010-0536
description: Apple QuickTime before 7.6.6 on Windows allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted BMP image.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.1.5:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.4.0:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.0.3:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.1.6:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.5.0:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.2.1:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.1.4:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.1.2:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.1.3:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.0.2:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.2.0:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.5.5:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:*:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.1.1:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.3.1:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.0.4:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.1.0:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.3.0:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.0.0:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.0.1:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.4.1:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:quicktime:7.4.5:-:windows:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
